text: f'idha futih sadi yajuj wmajwj, wantlqu min murtafaeat al'ard wantshru fi jnbatha msreyn, dana yawm alqiamat wbdat ahwalh fa'iidha 'absar alkufaar min shdt alfazae maftuhatan la takad tatrif, yadeun ealaa 'anfusahum balwyl fi hsrt: ya waylana qad kunaa lahyn ghafilin ean hdha alyawm waean al'iiedad lh, wakunaa bdhlk zalmyn
